BindStaffSkillGroupList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BindStaffSkillGroupList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "StaffEmail": "staff1@xxx.com",
    "SkillGroupList": [
        100,
        101
    ]
}
BindStaffSkillGroupList.title: 绑定坐席所属技能组示例

&Staffs.0.Phone=联系电话
&Staffs.0.Mail=联系人邮箱
&<公共请求参数>
CreateStaff.title: 创建客服示例

CreateUserSig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateUserSig
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "Uid": "staff1@xxx.com",
    "ClientData": "abc",
    "ExpiredTime": 86400
}

DeleteStaff.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,

        "staff1@xxx.com",
        "staff2@xxx.com"
    ]
}
